content.html: Only support GBTQ? You’re out. Only LBTQ? You’re out. Only LGTQ? You’re out. Only LGBQ? You’re out. It’s not that hard. Why would you support one but not the others? That betrays your misunderstanding of the system that does not distinguish between them and oppresses them all.
content.value:
Only support GBTQ? You’re out.
Only LBTQ? You’re out.
Only LGTQ? You’re out.
Only LGBQ? You’re out.

It’s not that hard.
Why would you support one but not the others? That betrays your misunderstanding of the system that does not distinguish between them and oppresses them all.
